description: Try our easy to follow Light And Creamy Carbonara recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Light And Creamy Carbonara Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 375 ml Nestle Carnation Evaporated Milk Light & Creamy
2 The Free Ranger Free Range Chicken Breast Fillets

recipeInstructions.text: Blend cornflour with 1/4 cup (60ml) Nestle carnation light & creamy cooking milk. Add to frying pan with remaining milk, stirring constantly until the sauce boils and thickens, stirring, add pasta and baby spinach; toss through. Sprinkle with cheese. Serve immediately.

Blend cornflour with 1/4 cup (60ml) Nestle carnation light & creamy cooking milk. Add to frying pan with remaining milk, stirring constantly until the sauce boils and thickens, stirring, add pasta and baby spinach; toss through. Sprinkle with cheese. Serve immediately.

Blend cornflour with 1/4 cup (60ml) Nestle carnation light & creamy cooking milk. Add to frying pan with remaining milk, stirring constantly until the sauce boils and thickens, stirring, add pasta and baby spinach; toss through. Sprinkle with cheese. Serve immediately.
